unnormalised: Vacayakhatir desam bhair vochot tillenkam, aikun gheiat! USD ani INR hacho rate kiteak tho vello thar ravona. Last mhonn 10/26/2024 hye tarek, ₹83.20 ek $ khatir aslo. Punn mhaka vicharun gheunkonaka; tumche bankant vo ek visvasache forex dealer kodden check karat tumche dukhaan kamaila rupees badaltan!
normalised: Vacayakhatir deshbhaire vethat mhonnge, aikun ghevat! U-S-D chem I-N-R rate thode divasani halonk laglam. Aami tevis october don hazar chovisacher check kelem tedna, doller ekak sumar rupee teensi point don shunya aslem. Punn, aami sanglam mhonnun dhortanamaka; tumchi bank vo visvasth forex dealeracho adhar gheun tumche kashtachi kamain kelele rupee convert korun gheiat!

unnormalised: Ani tum Europe vochot asat zalear, EUR pan INR add kiteak tho baro disona. ₹88 diunk padtele ek €1 khatir. Ugddas dovorat, hea figures fattim poros fudden badaltat tum "bon voyage" mhunne poros! Mhunnun, tumcho budget plan karat tho voddlea buffer-an mhonn bary.
normalised: Ani tumhi Europeak vochunk asa zalear, E-U-R hem I-N-R adharak borem disona. Euro ekak tumkam sumar rupee atyashi att diunk poddttele. Ugddas dovrat, him fakt andazeache ankde asat, ani him utri "bon voyage" mhonta astana bodlunk xaktat! Mhunnun, budget pre-planning korun thodo buffer dovorn hem sadharanpanan borem.

unnormalised: Oh, ani tum jet-setters zatat UK-ak, GBP azun strong asa. Tum ₹100 ditele ek £1 khatir. Ouch! Bara zan tumche panem samballat vo souvenir shopping kami karat, eh? Ugddas dovorat rates compare korat provider-an ani tallat hidden charges! Happy travels, yaars!
normalised: Oh, ani tumhi soglle U-K-k vetat mhonnge, G-B-P halinchui takatvar asa. Tumhi pound ekak sumar rupee ek xembhor ditole. Aie! Tumchi poixi sanchounk suru korat, vo souveniri ghevop thoddem kamich korat, kitem? Vegvegllea providersachi rates tulna korat ani te chalu naslole hidden chargesacher nodor dovrat! Tumkam sukhi proyas, yaars!
